game.name: Pearls of Wisdom
game.shortDescription: A rogue-like mindfulness deck builder with real-world side quests. Match inspiring and reflective quotes, combine special effect emblems and do out of game side quests to get high scores. Reflect, relax, and walk away feeling good after you've finished playing.
